channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 World Series Odds: Dodgers Become Heavier Favorite After Adding Tucker
item.description: The Dodgers have been active this offseason, watching their World Series odds drop in the process. See the latest.

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft Order: Raiders At No. 1, Top 24 Picks Set
item.description: The first 24 picks in the 2026 NFL Draft order are set following the 2025 regular season. See where each team currently stands.

item.title: Best Sportsbook Promos & Bonus Bets - January 2026 Top Offers
item.description: Discover the best sportsbook promos and bonus bets for January 2026. Compare welcome offers and top bonuses from leading betting sites.

item.title: BetMGM Bonus Code 'FOXSPORTS' Gets Up to $1,500 Paid Back in Bonus Bets
item.description: Use BetMGM Bonus Code FOXSPORTS to get up to $1,500 back in Bonus Bets if your first wager loses. Claim your BetMGM welcome offer today.

item.title: College Basketball Games of the Week: Iowa, IU Meet in Big Ten New Coaches Battle
item.description: There's a full slate of college basketball games on FOX this holiday weekend for both men's and women's ball, and here's why and when you should watch...

item.title: CFP National Championship preview: Miami's path to knocking off Indiana
item.description: Will the Hoosiers cap an undefeated season, or can the Canes pull off a stunner? Here are the keys to the game.

item.title: Keep, cut or add? What to do with these eight rising and falling players
item.description: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upward or downward, and explains whether they should be added or cut from your roster.

item.title: Rising prices, plenty of QBs and 1,200 players without a home
item.description: The transfer portal closes today for most players. Here are five things to know after two wild weeks.

item.title: Power Rankings: How far Michigan, Iowa State, Vanderbilt drop after losses
item.description: Three of the five remaining unbeaten teams suffered their first losses and tumbled down the top 25.

item.title: Rating Boozer, Dybantsa and 54 more freshmen
item.description: The 56 standouts, surprises and more of a historic freshman class, starting with Cameron Boozer and AJ Dybantsa.
